properties.title: Chamanna d'Es-cha CAS
properties.description:
Authentic SAC cabin on the Engadin side of Piz Kesch, one of the stopovers on the Kesch-Trek, the four-day mountain hike from SAC cabin to SAC cabin. Located on a ridge, the Es-cha hut offers a splendid view across Engadin and to the Bernina range at the back. Ideally located for the ascent to Piz Kesch, high routes, mountain bike and ski mountaineering tours in the Albula range. A special feature of the cabin: the stucco ceiling of the cosy lounge.
The Es-Cha hut is located on the popular Haute Route Graubünden https://www.hauteroute-graubuenden.ch
